name: Mission High School
description: School Type: High School Serves grades: 9, 10, 11, 12, 13 Uniform Policy: Mission enforces a school responsible and appropriate dress code. School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper Academic focus school-wide is aimed at preparing ALL of our students for college and careers with rigorous courses including a rich array of AP and honors courses. Local business and college partnerships assist in making sure that Mission HS students set high goals throughout their high school years and upo
